name: la-ruche-qui-dit-oui
description: Marketplace de produits locaux - Multi-plateforme (Web + Mobile)

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:web && npm run build:api
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:apps && npm run install:packages
scripts.install:apps: cd apps/web && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.install:packages: cd packages/shared && npm install && cd ../ui-components && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:web && npm run lint:mobile && npm run lint:api
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:web && npm run test:api
scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd apps/backend && npx prisma db seed

author: LaRucheQuiDitOui Team
